item.title: The entance and exit to my property (block of flats) is blocked by rubbish on a regular basis., 28th August
item.description:
Some of the local residents are careless and irresponsable about how to dispose of their waste and rubbish. Recycle bags are used to put ALL rubbish and are left on the street daily.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lorrimore Road, Walworth, London

item.title: Fly tipped household items, 28th August
item.description:
This appeared here in the last 20 minutes. Someone’s unwanted children’s items. Please can we have regular street cleaners back. It looks awful in this area so much litter and dumped items.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marmadon Road, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole at the bottom of the hill after workmen have finished their work, 28th August
item.description:
Very deep pothole at the bottom of the hill after workmen have finished their work. I cycled past in the morning when workmen were there. By 6pm they had gone but there was a very deep pothole outside the busstop at the bottom of the hill. Incredibly dangerous for cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crystal Palace Park Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown Trees and Vegetation on the sides of water stream, 28th August
item.description:
I would like to report an overgrown tree located behind 57 Wyncham Avenue. The branches are hanging low and could potentially damage the building during strong winds. Additionally, the surrounding vegetation and shrubs have become excessively overgrown, penetrating the fence and weakening the structure of the outhouse. Could you please arrange for an inspection and necessary maintenance at the earliest convenience? Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57, Wyncham Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large piece of ?coving? in gutter, 28th August
item.description:
Large bit of white coving in gutter by kerb. Has been driven over sending bits all over the place. Also loss of parking space as people don't want to put their car on this

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 107, Landells Road, East Dulwich, London

item.title: Electric Cupboard hazard, 28th August
item.description:
The communal electric cupboard for Anthony Cope Court is just open, which seems dangerous. This is the electric supply to the flats. The wood is totally rotted at the bottom so it can be pulled open easily

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chart Street, Hackney, London

item.description:

item.title: Hazardous material fly tip, 28th August
item.description:
Someone has reported this already but failed to stress what a legitimate health and safety threat this is. Children live on this estate. Metal weapons like saws and picks left laying out for anybody to take. Rusty metals get dumped here daily. Dangerous!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Richmond Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree branches are falling - hazardous, 28th August
item.description:
Hi Bromley council, Could this tree be pruned, this has been an issue over the last 3 years. Heavy branches are falling which could cause fatal injuries. The tree is at the end of Perth Road, Beckenham.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Perth Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dogs running around on the estate grass area, 28th August
item.description:
Dogs are being brought onto the estate grass at all hours, including outside residents’ windows. The gates meant to prevent this have been broken, causing disturbance and damage to the area.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pembury Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
